context.p: After installing your dataset(s), perform the following procedure to add a database resource.

step.cmd: Navigate to the gem folder. Open the db.ini file using a plain text editor.
step.info:
The file is located in:
For Windows: SpectrumDirectory\server\modules\gem
For UNIX/Linux: SpectrumDirectory/server/modules/gem
A single db.ini file can define multiple database resources; however, there can be only one database resource per invocation of the GeoEnrichmentLookup service.

step.cmd: For every database that you want to register, add a line to the file consisting of the database file name and location.
Save the file. Make note of the database file name which will need to be specified when setting up the Options for the .
